description: Non-material amendment for planning permission dated 08/10/2020 ref: 2020/0362/P which itself varied application 2018/1715/P dated 03/12/2018 and 2012/4628/P dated 23/01/2012 for the Redevelopment of site to create a mixed use development comprising 8 new buildings between 3 and 9 storeys in height to provide, employment, housing, retail market, cinema, produce market, including change of use of 1 Hawley Road to educational, and associated works (summary), AMENDMENTS INCLUDE replace cycle storage with light industrial use (Class B1c) to arches E4 and E5, disperse cycle parking throughout site, amend condition 32 in relation to public cycle storage areas and number of cycle parking spaces required
site_name:
Site at Hawley Wharf
Land bounded by Chalk Farm Road
Castlehaven Road
Hawley Road
Kentish Town Road and Regents Canal
London
NW1
